description: Ms. codex. Title supplied by cataloger. Physical description: 11 lines per page. Written in very large casual naskh in black ink with use of another color (yellow?), now faded to light brown. Wove paper. Fol. 175 and 176 are pasted one with the other. Inscription on a slip of paper: "On the inside of the former cover, which consisted of an absolutely worm-eaten dirty piece of modern Oriental cloth(?), was written by a contemporaneous hand: رسائل الدامغه فى عقائد الدروز واحوالها م Oct. 22 1902".
author: Risālah al-dāmighah lil-fāsiq ... [etc.].
abstract: Collection of twenty-eight texts of the Druze community, comprising texts 5, 8, 13, 15-25, 27-40 in Sylvestre de Sacy's description of Druze writings in Exposé de la religion des Druzes (1838).
contents: 1. fol. 1a-b: [Short text beginning with: "Bismi Llāh al-raḥmān al-raḥīm farāʼiḍ al-mīthāq sittah wa-ʻashrīn yajibu ḥafẓuhā"].
5. fol. 37a-53b: al-Risālah al-dāmighah lil-fāsiq al-radd ʻalá al-Nuṣayrī laʻanahu al-Mawlá fī kull kawr wa-dawr.
7. fol. 67a-83b: Risālat al-Tanzīh ilá jamāʻat al-Muwaḥḥidīn.
13. fol. 115b-116a: Mukātabah ilá ahl al-Kudīyah al-bayḍāʼ.
16. fol. 120a-122a: Risālat Khumār Ibn Jaysh al-Sulaymānī al-ʻAkāwī.
20. fol. 137a-139b: al-Taqdīs duʻāʼ al-sādiqīn duʻāʼ li-najāt al-Muwaḥḥidīn al-ʻārifīn.
21. fol. 139b-141a: Dhikr maʻrifat al-Imām wa-asmāʼ al-Ḥudūd al-ʻulwīyah rūḥānī wa-jusmānī.
23. fol. 147a-152b: al-Risālah al-mawsūmah bi-al-Iʻdhār wa-al-indhār al-shāfīyah li-qulūb ahl al-ḥaqq min al-marḍ wa-al-iḥtiyār.
25. fol. 166a-187a: Kitāb fīhi taqsīm al-ʻulūm wa-ithbāt al-ḥaqq wa-kashf al-maknūn.
26. fol. 187b-195a: al-Mawsūmah bi-Risālat al-zinād wa-al-sabīl al-wāḍiḥ lil-ṭālib al-murtād.
27. fol. 195a-202a: al-Mawsūmah bi-Risālat al-Shamʻah wa-mathaluhā fī al-tawḥīd wa-mathalu ḥudūdihā ʻalá al-maslak al-thālith.
29. fol. 211a-215b: Shiʻr al-Nafs wa-mā tawfīqī illā bi-Llāh.
provenance: Acquired from Brill, Leyden, 1900, from the books of Amīn ibn al-Ḥasan al-Ḥulwānī al-Madanī al-Ḥanafī (Medina).
creator: Risālah al-dāmighah lil-fāsiq ... [etc.].
